name: Koenigsegg
description: An engineering marvel that blends extreme speed with precision handling, making every drive a breathtaking experience.

name: Nissan GT-R
description: A legend born on the track, delivering raw power and aerodynamic excellence for those who demand high performance.

name: Rolls-Royce
description: The pinnacle of luxury and craftsmanship, ensuring an ultra-smooth ride with timeless elegance.

name: All New Rush
description: A rugged and spacious SUV designed for families and explorers who crave adventure beyond the cityscape.

name: CR-V
description: A versatile and stylish crossover that offers comfort, efficiency, and ample space for every journey.

name: All New Terios
description: Built to conquer rough terrains with ease, this SUV is perfect for those who embrace the thrill of off-road exploration.

name: MGZX Exclusive
description: A cutting-edge electric hatchback that delivers eco-friendly efficiency without compromising on style and comfort.

name: New MGZS
description: A smart and connected SUV with intelligent features, redefining the way you experience modern driving.

name: MGZX Excite
description: A sporty and agile hatchback that combines electric innovation with a fun-to-drive spirit, ideal for city commutes.
